trans-unit.source: Represents changes in pitch for the speech content of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa as alterações no tom do conteúdo de fala de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The pitch contour is defined as an array of targets at specified time positions in the speech output.
trans-unit.target: O contorno de tom é definido como uma matriz de destinos em posições de tempo especificado na saída de fala.

trans-unit.source: Each target is defined by three parameters.
trans-unit.target: Cada destino é definido por três parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The first value is a percentage of the period of the contained text (a number followed by "%").
trans-unit.target: O primeiro valor é uma porcentagem do período do texto contido (um número seguido por "%").

trans-unit.source: The second value specifies the amount to raise or lower the pitch.
trans-unit.target: O segundo valor Especifica o valor para aumentar ou diminuir o tom.

trans-unit.source: The third value designates the unit to use for the number specified in the second value; either percentage or hertz (Hz).
trans-unit.target: O terceiro valor determina a unidade a ser usado para o número especificado no valor do segundo; porcentagem ou hertz (Hz).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint> objects are obtained by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.GetContourPoints%2A> method, or used to set the pitch contour for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.SetContourPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint> objetos são obtidos com o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.GetContourPoints%2A> método, ou usado para definir o contorno de densidade para um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.SetContourPoints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Single" /> that specifies the point at which to apply the pitch change in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Single" /> que especifica o ponto em que se aplica a alteração de tom no <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: This is expressed as the elapsed percentage of the duration of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> at that point.
trans-unit.target: Isso é expresso como o percentual de duração decorrido do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> nesse ponto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Single" /> that specifies the amount to raise or lower the pitch.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Single" /> que especifica o valor para aumentar ou diminuir o tom.

trans-unit.source: A member of <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType" /> that specifies the unit to use for the number specified in the <c>change</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um membro de <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType" /> que especifica a unidade a ser usada para o número especificado no parâmetro <c>alterar</c>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the amount to raise or lower the pitch at a point in a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que representa o valor para aumentar ou diminuir o tom em um ponto em um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: This value is combined with a value from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType%2A> property to define the amount to raise or lower the pitch.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é combinado com um valor da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType%2A> propriedade para definir o valor para aumentar ou diminuir o tom.

trans-unit.source: If a pitch value is not defined for 0% or 100% then the nearest pitch target is copied.
trans-unit.target: Se um valor de densidade não está definido para 0% ou 100%, em seguida, o destino de tom mais próximo é copiado.

trans-unit.source: All relative values for the pitch are relative to the pitch value just before the contained text.
trans-unit.target: Todos os valores relativos para o tom são relativas ao valor de densidade antes do texto contido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType" /> that specifies the unit to use for the number specified in the <paramref name="change" /> parameter of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um membro do <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.ChangeType" /> que especifica a unidade a ser utilizada para o número especificado no parâmetro <paramref name="change" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A value from this enumeration is combined with a value from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Change%2A> property to define the amount to raise or lower the pitch.
trans-unit.target: Um valor dessa enumeração é combinado com um valor da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Change%2A> propriedade para definir o valor para aumentar ou diminuir o tom.

trans-unit.source: Provides methods for comparing objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para comparar objetos.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser convertido em uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> and equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um dado objeto é uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> e é igual à instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> and that obtained from the <paramref name="obj" /> argument are equal, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> e aquela obtida do argumento <paramref name="obj" /> são iguais; caso contrário, retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The method returns false if the <xref:System.Object> provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O método retornará false se o <xref:System.Object> fornecidos pelo `obj` argumento não pode ser convertido em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> that will be compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> que será comparada à instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma dada instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> é igual à instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> and that supplied through the <paramref name="other" /> argument are equal, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> e aquela fornecida por meio do argumento <paramref name="other" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash do inteiro assinado de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint> objects might have the same hash code even though they represent different time values.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint> objetos têm o mesmo código de hash, embora eles representam valores de tempo diferentes.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> to compare against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> provided by the <c>point2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> a ser comparada à instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>point2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> to compare against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> provided by the <c>point1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> a ser comparada à instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>point1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> instances referenced by <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are equal, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> referenciadas por <paramref name="point1" /> e <paramref name="point2" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> to compare against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> provided by the <c>point2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> a ser comparada à instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>point2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> to compare against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> provided by the <c>point1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> a ser comparada à instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>point1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> are NOT equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> NÃO são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> instances referenced by <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are NOT equal, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint" /> referenciadas por <paramref name="point1" /> e <paramref name="point2" /> NÃO forem iguais; caso contrário, retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Single" /> that specifies the point at which to apply the pitch change in a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Single" /> que especifica o ponto em que se deve aplicar a alteração de tom em um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: This is expressed as the elapsed percentage of the duration of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> at that point.
trans-unit.target: Isso é expresso como o percentual de duração decorrido do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> nesse ponto.

trans-unit.source: Time position values less than 0% or greater than 100% are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de posição de tempo menor que % 0 ou maior que 100% são ignorados.
